10. jamgudrani mp - MP Wind Farms Ltd, Dewas, Madhya Pradesh. Producer is MP Wind Farms.
11. jogmatti bses - BSES Ltd, Chitradurga district, Karnataka. Producer is BSES.
12. perungudi newam - Newam Power Company Ltd, Perungudi, Tamil Nadu. Producer is Newam.
13. kethanur wind farm - Kethanur Wind Farm, Kethanur, Tamil Nadu. Producer is Kethanur.

19. poolavadi chettinad - Chettinad Cement Corp Ltd, Poolavadi, Tamil Nadu. Producer is Chettinad.
20. shalivahana wind - Shalivahana Green Energy Ltd, Tirupur, Tamil Nadu. Producer is Shalivahana.
21. dangiri wind farm - Oil India Ltd, Jaiselmer, Rajasthan. Producer is Oil India.
